metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43300 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Stack overflow in PJSUA API when calling pjsua_recorder_create. An attacker-controlled 'filename' argument may cause a buffer overflow since it is copied to a fixed-size stack buffer without any size validation.

criterions.comment: asterisk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
pjproject: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
